1020.1:
[Queen Ansurek]
And this I promise to you all.
1020.2: With our renewed strength, | our kingdom shall be reborn!
1020.4: I can feel the Void's influence upon her.
1020.17: [nerubian guard] Get the queen to safety!

1021.2:
[Ansurek] Slender is the strand
that guides our destiny, | known only by true sacrifice.
1021.3:
In our kingdom of Azj-Kahet, | no one understood this sacrifice
more than Queen Neferess...
1021.5:
I saw this when the Black Empire came | to conscript us
for their last stand at Ny'alotha. | My mother refused them.
1021.6: [minion] For this treachery, | your line will sever itself!
1021.7: [grunts] This kingdom will wither | with the waning of your will--
1021.9:
[Ansurek] Our strength defined us
that day. | And in that moment, | we felt destined for greatness. | But in the years that followed, | our greatness was tarnished.
1021.10:
Look at them out there. | -[indistinct yelling]
-[Ansurek] Wretched. | Starving.
1021.11:
[Neferess sighs] I am not immune
to our people's suffering. | I believe better days will come.
1021.12:
[Ansurek] Not if you keep failing
to seize the moment. | What was the point
of you freeing our future, | only to leave us buried in the past?
1021.13:
[Neferess sighs] You comprehend so little. | There is much for you to learn
before you can be queen.
1021.17:
[Xal'atath] You have heard my voice
in your dreams, Great Queen.
1021.19: [Xal'atath] Yes, of the empire that was. | But the Old Gods are dead, | the empire lies in ashes, | and a shadow has fallen on your kingdom.
1021.20: But the blood of the Old Gods... | can make your people powerful again. | Your reign could last for eternity. | All you have to do is take my hand.
1021.21:
[Neferess] Your words are tempting, | but the cost is too great. | I would never risk my kingdom
for such power.
1021.22:
-[flame crackling]
-[Ansurek] Mother. | Who are you talking to?
1021.23: [Neferess sighs] Ghosts, dearest. | As always, they are my ready counsel.
1021.24:
[Ansurek] I'm not sorry for what I said. | I only want our people
to be great once more.
1021.25: [Neferess] Greatness is fleeting. | What we must do now is endure. | Your time will come, child, | but only when you are rea-- [gasps]
1021.29:
[Ansurek] You are not
the only one seeing ghosts, | Mother.
1021.30:
[Xal'atath] How sad, | to have a queen so wise, | and yet so ignorant
to the call of destiny.
1021.35: With this power, | Azj-Kahet is unbound.
1021.36: We will rise. | We will conquer. | And together, | we will finally claim our destiny!
